item.zoob.spawn_monster_of_the_ocean_dep: Spawn Monster Of The Ocean Depths
text.zoob.message.horde_zombie: §2A horde of zombies is approaching tonight...
text.zoob.message.horde_skele: §7A legion of skeletons will raid you tonight...
text.zoob.message.horde_spider: §dA brood of spiders will attack tonight...
text.zoob.message.horde_creeper: §aA swarm of creepers and zombies are lurking...
text.zoob.message.horde_zombskele: §8A horde of zombies and skeletons is approaching...
text.zoob.message.horde_enderman: §5Spawns of the End are attacking tonight...
text.zoob.message.horde_husk: §eA horde of husks is coming tonight...
text.zoob.message.horde_stray: §9A legion of strays will attack tonight...
text.zoob.message.return_to_overworld: §cThere is a horde tonight, return to the overworld or be killed!

text.zoob.message.invaders: §1A group of other-worldly invaders will hunt you tonight...
